auth.name: Name
auth.loginDescription: Enter your credentials to access your account
auth.registerDescription: Create a new account to start using our services

hero.dualAIDesc: Compare results from two AI models for unmatched accuracy
hero.accuracyDesc: Get the most precise text extraction from any document
hero.testimonial: OmniScan AI has transformed how we process our documents, saving us countless hours of manual work with exceptional accuracy.

hero.subtitle: Advanced OCR platform powered by dual AI engines - Gemini and ChatGPT - for unparalleled accuracy in text extraction and data structuring.

features.title: Advanced OCR Features
features.subtitle: Our platform combines the latest AI technologies to extract, analyze, and structure data from any document with unprecedented accuracy.

dualAI.title: Dual AI Processing
dualAI.description: Parallel processing with both Gemini and ChatGPT ensures the highest possible accuracy in text extraction.

comparison.title: Result Comparison
comparison.description: Compare and choose between results from different AI models to get the most accurate data extraction.

customPrompts.title: Custom AI Prompts
customPrompts.description: Fine-tune AI behavior with custom prompts specific to your document types and extraction needs.

batch.title: Batch Processing
batch.description: Process multiple documents at once for efficient high-volume data extraction projects.

structured.title: Structured Output
structured.description: Get results in clean, formatted markdown that's ready to use in your applications.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Process documents in multiple languages with equal accuracy and efficiency.

workflow.title: How It Works
workflow.subtitle: Our advanced dual-AI workflow ensures maximum accuracy through multiple verification steps

step1.title: Upload Documents
step1.description: Upload your images or documents that need OCR processing

step2.title: Dual AI Processing
step2.description: Both Gemini and ChatGPT process your documents simultaneously

step3.title: Result Comparison
step3.description: Review and select the most accurate results between AI models

step4.title: Deploy at Scale
step4.description: Process multiple documents with your preferred AI model

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that works for your needs, with no hidden fees

demo.title: See It In Action
demo.subtitle: Watch how OmniScan AI extracts and structures data from real documents
demo.videoDescription: Watch our platform extract data from invoices, receipts, and contracts with unparalleled accuracy using dual AI processing.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Document Processing?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses that have automated their data extraction with OmniScan AI
